issue.title: [Rust] DRY downcasted Arrays
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10065](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10065). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, we have a significant amount of repeated code to cover slight variations of downcasted arrays:
 \* BinaryArray
 \* LargeBinaryArray
 \* ListArray
 \* StringArray
 \* LargeStringArray

The goal of this issue is to clean up repeated code around.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10065?focusedCommentId=17201563) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8242
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8242>
